column6: The Gauntlet continues with the return of another classic Spider-Man foe...THE SCORPION! She has brand new powers, a new modus operandi, and you won't believe her reason for tangling with Spidey!
column8: | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller:Michael Del Mundo | penciller:Michael Gaydos | writer:Fred Van Lente | editor:Stephen Wacker
